recipesJson.name: Autumn Evenings
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description: A slightly sweetened Yam tobacco. Very Autumn-esque. Sweetened with the Molasses, and the tab blend seems to have a hint of sweetness. A good evening savory vape. It does have a longer steep, but that is mainly for the Tab Blended to settle where it needs to go, along with the Yam to do the same.
